Socialising

Include because?

Social isolation = Early exit

No sense of belonging = Early exit

Peer support = Better student outcomes

Approaches

Use ‘ice-breakers’ to facilitate student interaction, and maximise the amount of early socialising students partake in.

Highlight to students the benefits of creating peer groups, e.g. study groups

Use social media to create spaces for socialisation

Highlight to students the tools the institution makes available that they can use to communicate with each other

Socialise students with other current students

Delivery Methods:

Video

Activity

Social Media / Web

Text
